channel.title: Looking for Head Game Developer for server
channel.description:
Hey,
[b]This is a excellent opportunity to join the Team Rens group that is growing at a balanced paste.[/b] We are looking for a Presidential Developer who can aid us to success in our private server '[url=http://jarod-online.co.cc/test/]Ruwens's[/url]' that is being put together. You should have experience with programming in Java in a standard format, able to sustain from failure, and has a promising leadership that will play a large role through the organization.
[table][tr][td] [size=12pt][u][b]Key Duties[/b][/u][/size] [table][tr] [td][+][b]Support[/b][/td] [td][i]Engage with the Ruwens online community/team and provide support and assistance by helping to manage development content, investigating complains, solving issues, scheduling new content;[/i][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][+][b]Socializing [/b][/td] [td][i]Developing and maintaining good relations with members of Rens, with the aim of determining customer satisfaction with existing material & tools;[/i][/td] [/tr] [tr] [td][+][b]Response[/b][/td] [td][i]Attain feedback to guide future development.[/i][/td] [/tr][/table]
[size=12pt][u][b]Requirements[/b][/u][/size] [table][tr] [td][+]Exellent communication skills[/td] [td][+]Ability to show good initiative and judgement[/td] [td][+]Able to work at various hours daily and weekly[/td] [/tr][/table]
[size=12pt][b][u]Working hours[/u][/b][/size] Shift work will be required for this role in addition to working 2 or 3 weekends per month and at least 2 hours of work a day (therefore 28 - 42 hours a month giving you the rest of the month to yourself). [/table]
[u]To Apply[/u] Send a message to this account or email at thejaydawg@gmail.com

item.title: Looking for Head Game Developer for server
item.dc:creator: @Digital_Hotdogs Digital Hotdogs

item.title: Looking for Head Game Developer for server
item.dc:creator: @Server-Unknown.Net Server-Unknown.Net
item.description:
@Server-Unknown.Net wrote:

Hey,

This is a excellent opportunity to join the Team Rens group that is growing at a balanced paste. We are looking for a Presidential Developer who can aid us to success in our private server ‘Ruwens’s’ that is being put together. You should have experience with programming in Java in a standard format, able to sustain from failure, and has a promising leadership that will play a large role through the organization.

[table][tr][td]
[size=12pt]Key Duties[/size]
[table][tr]
[td][+]Support[/td]
[td]Engage with the Ruwens online community/team and provide support and assistance by helping to manage development content, investigating complains, solving issues, scheduling new content;[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td][+]Socializing [/td]
[td]Developing and maintaining good relations with members of Rens, with the aim of determining customer satisfaction with existing material & tools;[/td]
[/tr]
[tr]
[td][+]Response[/td]
[td]Attain feedback to guide future development.[/td]
[/tr][/table]

[size=12pt]Requirements[/size]
[table][tr]
[td][+]Exellent communication skills[/td]
[td][+]Ability to show good initiative and judgement[/td]
[td][+]Able to work at various hours daily and weekly[/td]
[/tr][/table]

[size=12pt]Working hours[/size]
Shift work will be required for this role in addition to working 2 or 3 weekends per month and at least 2 hours of work a day (therefore 28 - 42 hours a month giving you the rest of the month to yourself).
[/table]

To Apply
Send a message to this account or email at thejaydawg@gmail.com

Read full topic
